body.name: Portable Washing Machine, Foldable Washer Machine,6.5L Small Washer and Dryer, Mini Portable Washing Machine for Apartments, Dorm, Camping, RV, Travel Laundry Purple
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Fortable Washing Machine】-The mini washer is equipped with a detachable 28.54in drain hose and easy to unfold, with a capacity of 6.5L. It can fold and store when not in use, takes up little space that it is an ideal choice for your apartment, RV, balcony, and camping trip and can easily take it with you

【Safe Water & Energy Saving】-Compared with the traditional household washing machine, this foldable washing machine only needs a small amount of water and detergent, can make small clothes clean and fresh, no need to spend too much time and money at the laundromat, and you have more rest time in the apartment

【Power Cleaning】-Bionic hand rub cleaning mode, full range of turbine cleaning work, to solve the problem of clothing mixing, very suitable for underwear, socks and other small clothes, to ensure skin health for the family

【One Key Multi-Function Control】-Three functions can be achieved at the touch of a button, with 1 mins, 5 mins, 10 mins modes. Regular semi-automatic cleaning mode, through high frequency vibration to accelerate the decomposition of stains emulsification, so that you can easily complete the cleaning or drying effect

【1 Year Warranty Service】 - We provide 1 year warranty service for all our products, if you have any questions, please contact us, contact email: 1366908598@qq.com, we will provide you with satisfactory service
body.description: 6.5L Portable Foldable Washing Machine Outdoor Activities & Indoor Apartment Suitable Mini portable washing machine can be folded when not in use, occupying small space, easy to carry With ergonomic portable handle, very suitable for the elderly, children and women to use, flexible placement of portable washing machines With only a small amount of water and detergent, you can realize the washing and draining functions of traditional washing machines, saving water and energy, so that you have more rest time to enjoy life! It is the best choice for washing small clothes such as socks and underwear alone! Solve the problem of washing clothes and protect people's skin health Ideal for apartments, dormitories, Tours, motorhomes and other occasions

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: List: Portable Washing Machine (cover included) *1 Instructions *1 Drain Basket *1 Adapter *1 Drain pipe *1 Bionic hand rubbing cleaning technology Rated voltage: 110-220v Rated power: 36w One key multi-function intelligent washing, easy to control! 6.5L Portable Foldable Washing Machine Outdoor Activities & Indoor Apartment Suitable Mini portable washing machine can be folded when not in use, occupying small space, easy to carry With ergonomic portable handle, very suitable for the elderly, children and women to use, flexible placement of portable washing machines With only a small amount of water and detergent, you can realize the washing and draining functions of traditional washing machines, saving water and energy, so that you have more rest time to enjoy life! It is the best choice for washing small clothes such as socks and underwear alone! Solve the problem of washing clothes and protect people's skin health Ideal for apartments, dormitories, Tours, motorhomes and other occasions

Easy to achieve 1 min, 5 min, 10 min washing mode The emulsion decomposition of stains is accelerated by high frequency vibration Wash timing to keep clothes clean or dry Portable handle Ergonomically designed, very suitable for the elderly, children and women Flexible foldable washing machine, beautiful and easy to carry, is the best choice for outdoor camping and apartment places! 4-Point anti-slip suction cup Increases friction to keep mini washing machines stable during washing or draining Thick chassis It effectively isolates the internal motor equipment of the washing machine, fully absorbs the ground, and stabilizes the base of the washing machine

Simply open or close the bottom button, can easily cooperate with the washing machine drainage and water storage work. Making housework easier! Equipped with a detachable 28.54in drain hose to avoid the drain leakage problem of mini washing machine, and flexibly change the drainage path
